Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #the Eyedrops#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Red Rupee#.
